item.description:
This week, Kevin will be giving it another go with the third chapter to his graphic novel, The Survival Engine (it's about zombies...perfect to get us into the mood for Halloween!) Also, Sheila will be posting a short piece of us to look at as well.

Please look for these under the Files section, read, and be ready to offer constructive feedback at the Meetup!

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We usually try to save the big long table by the back.
item.name: First Workshop of October Meetup
